Title: Madder of Degrees
Plot: Spring fever hits the Windy City as springlike warmth during the middle of winter prompts PJ and Bobby to hold a picnic in the park...but a crucial life decision complicates the outing. Meanwhile, Kenny begins a new relationship, and Mike tries vainly to emulate actor Mathew McConaughey by buying a dog and a Jeep.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
